Suggested Calming Techniques

Evidence-based interventions for your current stress level

Box Breathing

2-3 minutes

4-4-4-4 breathing pattern to regulate your nervous system

  • ‚Ä¢Inhale through your nose for 4 counts
  • ‚Ä¢Hold your breath for 4 counts
  • ‚Ä¢Exhale through your mouth for 4 counts
  • + 2 more steps
üåø

5-4-3-2-1 Grounding

2-3 minutes

Use your senses to anchor yourself in the present moment

  • ‚Ä¢Name 5 things you can SEE
  • ‚Ä¢Name 4 things you can TOUCH
  • ‚Ä¢Name 3 things you can HEAR
  • + 2 more steps
üßò

Progressive Muscle Relaxation

5-10 minutes

Systematically tense and release muscle groups

  • ‚Ä¢Start with your toes - tense for 5 seconds, then release
  • ‚Ä¢Move to your calves - tense and release
  • ‚Ä¢Continue up your body: thighs, stomach, hands, arms, shoulders
  • + 2 more steps
ü§∏

Gentle Movement

2-3 minutes

Use movement to release tension and regulate

  • ‚Ä¢Stand or sit comfortably
  • ‚Ä¢Slowly roll your shoulders back 5 times
  • ‚Ä¢Gently turn your head side to side
  • + 2 more steps
